name: Oval Opal Stud Style Earrings
description:
Beautiful white opals…below is a description of what a “White Opal” is:

	White Opal – The same opal as black opal except that it does not have a dark background so that the foreground colour is light in appearance. This opal ranges from brilliant crystal appearance, which means that you can look down into the stone, to a more delicate pale colour which is not translucent. A white opal is sometimes called a crystal opal.

	Details of these earrings:

	Gemstone: Opal
Shape: Oval
Size: 7mm x 5mm
Color: Rainbow Flash
Cut Grade: Good
Finish & Polish: Good

	Settings: Sterling Silver plated posts
Butterfly backs.

	**Please Note: You will see slight variations in color and in the “pattern,” of the gemstone because each stone is cut individually. These natural slight variations will enhance the beauty and the individuality of the gemstone

name: Amethyst Cabachon Earrings
description: The Sterling Silver really adds to the beauty of the deep purple gemstone. Here are the details: Stone: Amethyst Shape: Round Cabachon Size: 7mm TCW: per stone: 1.92 tcw. per pair: 3.84 tcw. Color Grade: Deep Purple Clarity Grade: SI Tone: Dark Saturation: Strong Cut Grade: Medium Finish & Polish: Good Origin: Madagascar *Please Note: You will see slight variations in color and in the “pattern,” of the gemstone because each stone is cut individually. These natural slight variations will enhance the beauty and the individuality of the gemstone. *

name: Green Adventurine and Glass Beaded Bracelet
description:
In this bracelet I combined Czechoslovakian Glass Beads with Genuine Green Adventurine Gemstone Beads. This piece is truly unique; each diamond cut Adventurine varies in size and color…why you ask? Because they are hand-cut! The round Adventurine beads are darker and are more vibrant in color. The base color of the bracelet is an opaque honey color and was put together using the Peyote stitch. The outer beads are shiny gold. The findings and clasp are gold plated and soldered.
This bracelet measure 7 1/4 inches from clasp to clasp. The width is one inch

name: Vivacious Violet Glass Beaded Bracelet
description:
If you want to wear a unique piece of jewelry, then this piece is for you. Hues of violet/purple and blue go beautifuly together in this bracelet. I have used over 20 grams of czechoslovakian glass seed beads to create this unique look.
The bracelet is attached using a gold toned button.
On each loop there is a large pearl finish accent white bead.
This bracelet measures 7 1/2 inches long and has an approximate circumfrance of 2 inches
